item.description:
Hi Everyone,

I wanted to let you know that this group is merging with Awakening Awareness Inspired by The Four Agreements. Go to http://www.meetup.com/Awakening-Awareness-Inspired-by-The-Four-Agreements/

for more info. If you are interested please join the Awakening Awareness Inspired by The Four Agreements group and remove yourself from Wisdom & Grace so I can close Wisdom & Grace.

If you have that deep yearning to feel love MORE deeply, meet & share with like-minded folks who desire to live with love & awareness...come play with us! In our time together learn tools of awareness, meditate, share, laugh, cry...respecting & celebrating our awakened humanity with grace & a humble heart.

You can check out some of my blogs, events, etc. at www.graceventura.com

I look forward to hearing back from you & meeting you all soon. Any questions, comments & inspiration are welcome. We have a couple of locations in Manchester or Marblehead. The next Meet Up will be in September so keep an eye out. In the meantime enjoy the beautiful days of Summer!

Many Blessings,

Grace
item.name: Closing Down Group. Please Join Awakening Awareness Inspired
